original_text: Two women will be preparing food together in the same place. God will take one of them away but he will leave the other one behind.’

sentences.original_text: Two women will be preparing food together
sentences.korean_translation: 두 여인이 함께 음식을 준비하고 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: God will take one of them away
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그들 중 한 사람을 데려가실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: but he will leave the other one behind
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 한 사람은 남겨두실 것입니다
